title: Web match history is a pure lag, crash and freeze fiesta - Heres my fix suggestion
body:
Hello,

im using the official web match history because no other online match history includes all and all old games.

Sadly when you are looking for a specific game which is at least 1 year old, you find yourself scrolling for a long time.
The browser begins to lag more and more the more you scroll down.

Then you finally reached the 1+ year mark and you start searching for the right game.
Back then you played the champ very often, so you have to click yourself through all the games to find the right game.

Now what makes it even worse: You cant simply rightclick the games and "open in a new tab", you can only left click them.
This means if you got the wrong game and wanna go back, you have to scroll and load the whoooole match history again.

Sometimes the browser just crashes or freezes. 

The current web matchhistory makes it nearly impossible to check old games.

**Simple fix 1:** Let us filter the games by date
**Simple fix 2:** Give us a "maximum games per site" option. Example: "Show only 20 games per site".

Both would be nice too.

But at least something has to be done.
This lag, crash and freeze fiesta cant  be ignored.

I hope my english was quite understandable. Im not a native speaker and usually use my english skills for smaltalks most of the time.

Thanks!
